restrict-permissions.access-denied: You don't have permission to access that command.

mentions-only.no-mentions: For that command to work, you have to `@mention` people.

reply-to-mentioned-users.no-mentions: For that command to work, you have to `@mention` people.

restrict-channels.channels-only: That command only works in the following channels: {{- channels}}.
restrict-channels.channels-and-dm-only: That command only works in DM and the following channels: {{- channels}}.
restrict-channels.dm-only: That command only works in DM.
restrict-channels.wrong-channel: That command does not work here.
